This notebook provides the image of the reconstructed matrix.

```{r,warning=FALSE,echo=FALSE}
require(dplyr)
require(ggplot2)
require(readr)
require(dtw)
```

```{r}
folder <- "umpca/reconstruction/"
file_list <- list.files(path = folder, pattern = "*.csv")

nsample=length(file_list)
for (i in 1:length(file_list)){
    name<-substr(file_list[i],start=1,stop=nchar(file_list[i])-4)
     assign(name, read.csv(paste(folder, file_list[i], sep=''),header=FALSE))
}
```

```{r}
image(as.matrix(hat_1),main="MPC1",asp=1)
```
